<h3 id="X38116">X(38116) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(6), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6+2*(b+c)*a^5-(3*b^2+4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4+4*b*c*(b+c)*a^3+(b^4+c^4-2*b*c*(2*b^2+3*b*c+2*c^2))*a^2-2*(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a+(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38116) = X(6)+2*X(5690) = X(8)+2*X(182) = 4*X(10)-X(1352) = 2*X(40)+X(31670) = 4*X(140)-X(3242) = 2*X(597)+X(34718) = X(944)-4*X(5092) = X(962)-4*X(19130) = X(1482)-4*X(3589) = X(3241)-4*X(10168) = 5*X(3617)+X(6776) = 5*X(3618)+X(12245) = 3*X(14561)-2*X(38035) = 3*X(14561)-4*X(38167) = 2*X(38029)-3*X(38064) = X(38035)-3*X(38047) = 3*X(38047)-2*X(38167) = 3*X(38064)-4*X(38118) = 3*X(38087)-X(38144) = 3*X(38087)-2*X(38165)</b>
<p>X(38116) lies on these lines: {6,5690}, {8,182}, {10,1352}, {30,38087}, {40,31670}, {140,3242}, {511,5657}, {515,38191}, {517,14561}, {518,10202}, {519,38029}, {524,38066}, {597,34718}, {944,5092}, {952,5085}, {962,19130}, {971,38190}, {1428,12647}, {1482,3589}, {1503,5790}, {2330,10573}, {3241,10168}, {3564,38112}, {3617,6776}, {3618,12245}, {3654,20423}, {3679,11179}, {3818,5818}, {5050,5846}, {5054,9041}, {5480,12702}, {5731,17508}, {5762,38185}, {5840,38192}, {5844,38110}, {5845,38121}, {5847,38127}, {5848,38128}, {5849,38129}, {5853,38117}, {5854,38119}, {5855,38120}, {6211,29659}, {9053,10246}, {9778,29317}, {9780,24206}, {10327,37527}, {10516,38042}, {11645,38074}, {12017,12645}, {12589,18395}, {18357,36990}, {28194,38146}, {28212,38136}, {28234,38049}, {33163,37619}</p>
<p>
X(38116) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5731, 17508), (10516, 38042), (14561, 38047), (38029, 38118), (38035, 38167), (38144, 38165)<br>
X(38116) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38029, 38118, 38064), (38035, 38047, 38167), (38035, 38167, 14561), (38087, 38144, 38165)<br>
</p>
